Name: ArchiCrypt Live
LRW: <ref>Containers created with ArchiCrypt Live version 5 use LRW</ref>

Name: CipherShed
CBC w/ predictable IVs: <ref name="ReferenceB">Containers created with TrueCrypt versions 1.0 through 4.0 use CBC.</ref>
LRW: <ref name="ReferenceC">Containers created with TrueCrypt versions 4.1 through 4.3a use LRW  and support CBC for opening legacy containers only.</ref>
XTS: <ref>Containers created with CipherShed or TrueCrypt versions 5.0+ use XTS  and support LRW/CBC for opening legacy containers only.</ref>

Name: Dm-crypt / LUKS
LRW: <ref name=cryptoapi-lrw>Starting with Linux kernel version 2.6.20  CryptoAPI supports the LRW mode: https://lwn.net/Articles/213650/</ref>

Name: TrueCrypt
XTS: <ref>Containers created with TrueCrypt versions 5.0 or later use XTS  and support LRW/CBC for opening legacy containers only.</ref>
